title: Contracts with ViaPath Technologies pertaining to federal prisons

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All federal prisons and correctional facilities-related contracts and associated amendments with ViaPath Technologies (https://www.viapath.com/) pertaining to their intelligence and investigative solutions, as well as contracts and associated amendments referring to their former name, Global Tel*Link, pertaining to their intelligence and investigative solutions, including but not exclusively:

• Voice IQ
• Called Party IQ
• Call IQ
• Location IQ
• GTL Data IQ

If any part of this request is determined to be exempt from disclosure, I request that all reasonably segregable, non-exempt portions of the records be released.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sarah Fathallah

communications.communication:

title: Contracts with Securus pertaining to federal prisons

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All federal prisons and correctional facilities-related contracts and associated amendments with Securus Technologies (https://securustech.net/) pertaining to the following solutions:

• Investigator Pro
• Word Alert
• Guarded Exchange
• THREADS
• ICER

If any part of this request is determined to be exempt from disclosure, I request that all reasonably segregable, non-exempt portions of the records be released.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sarah Fathallah
